data.text: We were delighted to host senior healthcare executives from the India, Middle East and Africa region this week for a productive and insightful visit to Northern Ireland, where they had the opportunity to engage with our thriving Life and health sciences sector. The programme kicked off with a dynamic networking day, featuring one-to-one meetings with some of our companies. This was followed by two days of site visits to medtech, precision medicine and diagnostics companies as well as cutting-edge research centres and hospitals in the North West and Belfast. This visit was a fantastic opportunity to showcase the innovation and expertise that Northern Ireland’s Life and health sciences sector has to offer. Thank you to everyone involved in making this visit a success. Armstrong Medical Ltd | Atrom Limited | Axial3D | B-Secur | Biopanda Reagents | Blue Zinc IT | CIGA Healthcare Ltd | Cirdan Ltd | CLONALLON LABORATORIES LTD | C-TRIC | Daytot | Granlab | Haemoband Surgical Ltd | Health Innovation Research Alliance Northern Ireland (HIRANI) | Neurovalens | Seating Matters | Sonrai | TriMedika | TruCorp Cheryl Wallace | Fahd Asif | Sameh Ahmed Salem | Sergio De la Puente | Urginia Mhlaba | Invest Northern Ireland - India, Middle East, Africa
